text: Ferenc "Frank" Arok (, ; 20 January 1932 â€“ 12 January 2021) was a Yugoslavian- Australian association football player and coach. He played for FK Jedinstvo Stara Pazova in the 1950s. From 1983 to 1989, he managed Australia. He also managed St George many times. Arok died on 12 January 2021, aged 88.Former Socceroos coach Frank Arok Dies ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian football managers Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:Australian men's soccer players Category:Australian soccer managers
